text: Anthony Vincent (1939–1999) was the Canadian ambassador to Peru. He was a key player in the Japanese embassy hostage crisis of 1996, in Peru. He later served as ambassador to Spain. He is the subject of the 2008 book The Ambassador's Word: Hostage Crisis in Peru 1996-97 by David J. Goldfield. Vincent died in 1999 at the age of 59. On the day of his death, Prime Minister of Canada Jean Chrétien gave a eulogy. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Canada to Peru Category:Ambassadors of Canada to Spain Category:Place of birth missing Category:Place of death missing
title: Anthony Vincent
